com.nokia.midp.examples.wma.chat
Class MessageHandler

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      com.nokia.midp.examples.wma.chat.MessageHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.wireless.messaging.MessageListener, java.lang.Runnable
public class MessageHandler
extends java.lang.Thread
implements javax.wireless.messaging.MessageListener

Handles setting up a connection and the sending and receiving of messages. Implements the MessageListener to listen for incoming messages.

Version:
1.0

Constructor Detail

MessageHandler

public MessageHandler(WMAMIDlet midlet)
Sets up the thread and starts it running.

Method Detail

run

public void run()
Defines the run() method which all threads must do. If there are no messages to be sent or received the thread waits to be notified. Once notified it calls the appropriate send or receive method.

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable

connect

public boolean connect()
Performs the connection and sets the message listener listening.

doSend

public void doSend(java.lang.String text,
                   java.util.Vector numbers)
Adds outgoing messages to a queue and notifies the thread that it has something to do.

send

public void send(OutgoingMessage out)
Sends a message on the connection. Creates a new TextMessage, sets the payload and tries to send the message.

Parameters:
out - the message to be sent

receive

public void receive()
Receives a message from the connection. Receives a message, tests to see if it is of type TextMessage if it is then it updates the ChatScreen with the received text.

notifyIncomingMessage

public void notifyIncomingMessage(javax.wireless.messaging.MessageConnection conn)
Handles the event of a message arriving on the connection. Increments a counter and notifies the thread that it has something todo.

Specified by:
notifyIncomingMessage in interface javax.wireless.messaging.MessageListener
Parameters:
conn - the message connection to which the listener is listening

exit

public void exit()
Handles the tidying up of the messageHandler. Sets listener interface to null to de-register it, closes the connection.

stopThread

public void stopThread()
Stops the thread. Sets the isRunning flag to false.
